item.title: Teleport error, "}" in wrong place
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (c.playerRights == 0) { if (playerCommand.startsWith("staff")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3045, 9554, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage(""); } } if (c.playerRights == 0) { if (playerCommand.startsWith("home")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3087, 3495, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage(""); } } if (c.playerRights == 0) { if (playerCommand.startsWith("train")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2524, 4777, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage(""); } }

item.title: Teleport error, "}" in wrong place

item.description:
@Rs_rebornz wrote:

This is the command, and i got a compiler errror. Please fix the code for me without using code.

The Command!

		if (c.playerRights == 0) {
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("staff")) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3045, 9554, 0, "modern");
				c.sendMessage("");
		}             
		if (c.playerRights == 0) {
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("home")) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3087, 3495, 0, "modern");
				c.sendMessage("");
		}               
		if (c.playerRights == 0) {
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("train")) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2524, 4777, 0, "modern");
				c.sendMessage("");
		}
